data.title: Prices and Memberships
data.meta_description: We have a range of membership packages available for access to unlimited visits, exclusive offers and discounts. Become a member to enjoy discounts!
data.text:
Online Tickets

All visitors (including UOW Science Space members) are encouraged to pre-purchase their tickets online via the link below to avoid disappointment. Some show sessions can book out during peak busy times, particularly rainy weekends and school holidays.

Regular Opening Hours

We are open every day from 10am-4pm (closed on Wednesdays during school terms). UOW Science Space and our Shop both close promptly at 4pm.

Prices

General Entry prices (no shows)

INDIVIDUAL ENTRY TICKET TYPE PRICE General Entry | Adult $16 General Entry | Concession $14 General Entry | Child (age 4-16 years) $12 General Entry | Infant (age 0-3 years) FREE

BOOK MY GENERAL ENTRY PASS (no shows)

Combined Pass prices (includes shows*)

COMBINED PASS TYPE *NEW FOR 2024* PRICE Individual Combined Pass | Adult $21 Individual Combined Pass | Concession $19 Individual Combined Pass | Child (age 4-16 years) $17 Family Combined Pass | 1 Adult & 2 children $52 Family Combined Pass | 2 Adults & 1 Child $55 Family Combined Pass | 2 Adults & 2 children $70 Infants (age 0-3 years) FREE

*NB: The Combined Pass offers discounted general entry plus 1 planetarium ticket and 1 science show ticket per person. Shows can only be selected on arrival. Some shows may have limited availability at peak times so early arrival is advised if you wish to see specific shows.

BOOK MY COMBINED PASS (includes shows)

Parking

Parking is free for all UOW Science Space visitors. On entering Science Space you will need to scan the QR code and register your car registration to enable the free parking. Failure to do so may result in fines being applied by NSW parking.

Gift Cards

Looking for that perfect gift for a young aspiring scientist? Why not grab a UOW Science Space gift card! Purchase your gift card online for the amount of your choice through the membership button below. Birthdays, Christmas, or just because, this gift is sure to make the special person in your life smile.

BUY ONLINE GIFT CARD!

Memberships

We have a range of membership packages available for access to unlimited visits, exclusive offers and discounts. Click the button below to purchase yours today!

MEMBERSHIP TYPE PRICE Individual Adult $85 Second Adult $32 Child (no limit) $11

NB Concession card holders must purchase memberships onsite with a valid concession card to receive discount.

BUY YOUR MEMBERSHIP ONLINE!

UOW Science Space members enjoy:

Free yearly general admission to UOW Science Space (during public sessions)

10% off Science Shop purchases

50% of Planetarium and Live Science shows

10% off UOW Science Space birthday party packages

Discounts on Mini Mondays preschool program, school holiday Curiosity Days and after school programs

15% off memberships to Early Start Discovery Space

Free parking (only in conjunction with UOW Science Space visit)

Free or discounted general admission to the following (excludes special exhibits and events):

Discovery Centre Bendigo

Newcastle Regional Museum

National Maritime Museum, Sydney (20% discount off the Big Ticket)

Powerhouse Museum, Sydney* FREE entry

Questacon, Canberra FREE entry (includes 10% off Q Shop)>**

Sciencentre, Brisbane FREE entry

Science Works, Melbourne Museum and Immigration Museum, part of Museums Victoria***

SciTech, Western Australia (includes 20% off Discovery shop)

Please note

We accept all major debit and credit cards (except American Express).

Weekday shows (during school terms) are scheduled for booked schools and groups. Limited tickets may be available to the public but are not guaranteed. Please ask at reception upon arrival for more details.

In peak busy times such as school holidays, planetarium and science shows can book out. Please arrive early to avoid disappointment. Show tickets are issued on a first-come, first-served basis.

Entry requirements

Childrenâ€™s entry price applies to children between the ages of 4 and 18.

Children must be accompanied and supervised by a responsible adult. Children under the age of 16 will not be admitted into the exhibition or any shows without an accompanying adult.

Carers must carry a valid companion or carers card.

Discounted memberships

UOW staff and students also receive 10% discount off a Science Space membership on presentation of a valid staff or student card.

Membership Conditions:

Memberships cannot be used on some special events although discounts may be offered.

Only one discount can be used per membership purchase

We encourage visitors to take out a membership to their local science centre or museum. Reciprocal benefits are subject to change without advanced notice. For more information about benefits please contact us. Memberships are not valid for school or group visits.

You will need to produce current photo ID with a valid membership card for entry. Memberships are NOT transferable between different families. Entry will only be granted to family members listed on card.

Memberships are non-refundable.

As per the reciprocal conditions, visitors who hold a Museums Victoria membership but reside in NSW are required to pay usual UOW Science Space entry fees.

Free entry for reciprocal members residing outside of a 50km radius of the Powerhouse, Sydney. Standard admission fees will apply to UOW Science Space members living with the 50km radius.

**Free entry for reciprocal members residing outside of a 100km radius of Questacon, Canberra. Standard admission fees will apply to UOW Science Space members living within the 100km radius.

***Free entry to Melbourne Museum, Scienceworks and Immigration Museum, part of Museums Victoria available only to UOW Science Space Members residing outside of Victoria.

N.B. UOW Science Space members will receive a 10% discount off the total birthday party cost. Memberships are not valid for party package bookings and cannot be used to gain free entry for party guests.

Regular Opening Hours (NSW Term time)

Monday: 10am-4pm

Tuesday: 10am-4pm

Wednesday: CLOSED (during school term)

Thursday: 10am-4pm

Friday: 10am-4pm

Saturday : 10am-4pm

Sunday: 10am-4pm
